item.description:
It has been a while since we had a workshop!

Scoop This! has a great meeting room we'll be using for our workshop. They have gratiously waived the rental fee for the room if we all have something to eat, so please cool off with some Scoop This! Homemade Icecream.

Bring your recent completed and in progress work to share with everyone! All are welcome. Any medium of art is welcome- painting, sculpture, photography, poetry, fiction, performance art, music. Whatever you do, bring it here. :)

I have new material from my story Ferguson's Finger.

I look forward to seeing everyone!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the meeting room. Walk to the counter in the back of the store. The meeting room door will be behind your right shoulder.
item.name: Workshop & Ice Cream
